description: Main entry point for a Flutter mobile application setting up dependency injections, routing, and the main widget tree.

classes.name: BookNestApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up providers and configures the MaterialApp with routes and theme.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Stateful widget managing bottom navigation and switching between primary screens.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, sets up local storage, creates app state, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BookNestApp, setting up providers and MaterialApp with routing.

methods.name: _MainScaffoldState.build
methods.description: Builds the Scaffold with bottom navigation and displays selected screen.
